General.Name: Alamos Gold Inc
General.Description: Alamos Gold Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and extraction of precious metals in Canada and Mexico. The company primarily explores for gold and silver deposits. It holds 100% interest in the Young-Davidson mine and Island Gold mine located in the Ontario, Canada; Mulatos mine located in the Sonora, Mexico; and Lynn Lake project situated in the Manitoba, Canada. Further, it holds interest in Quartz Mountain project located in the Oregon United states.  Alamos Gold Inc. is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: Brookfield Place, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2T3
